msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm curious why there's here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Do you know, ? At any rate, it does liven up the island. I approve, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This it's puzzling, isn't it? It seems to shout, "Fall asleep out in the open!" <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I suppose the free-spirited sort might find sleeping under the stars alluring. Perhaps you should give it a try sometime, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> in a place like this, ? It's rather unusual, don't you think? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, I like it! In fact, I think I'll invite over to watch my favorite show in the fresh air.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> here of all places. It's perfect!Music sounds even more fabulous when it's accompanied by the beauty of nature. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, one's life should be full of music. That's very important, don't you think?

Punctuality is very important, darling. It's terribly rude to be late for an engagement. <20_3 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So I'm THRILLED someone put
here. You see, it's : right now, which means I best get going because I have plans<20_3 arg="3" />to meeteh <20_3 arg="6" />Oh ! I've completely forgotten who I was supposed to meet!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The it's so pretty. It's clearly been well cared for. Just looking at it cheers me up, !

Strange place for a bath, isn't it? I mean, how can one enjoy a nice soak in the midst of foot traffic? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This MUST be part of an avant-garde art installation. Though if it is, , I am NOT getting the deeper message.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I wouldn't have thought to put here in a place like this, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But it is charming and whimsical, and it provides a lovely place to stop and admire the scenery.
Oh my. Were you <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />wanting to sit in the here, by any chance? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Perhaps all the island excitement has worn you out? You poor thing, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Listening to the wind whistle across accompanied by
<20_3 arg="3" />Oh , I can't imagine a more beautiful sound right now.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Will you look at this! There's here, of all places, . Well, I suppose cooking and eating outdoors would give one a healthy appetite.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I guess I should exercise while I have at my disposal. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Staying fit IS the key to feeling fabulous, they say.Then again, relaxing and eating cookies makes me feel fabulous too.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know how or when got here, but it does fit right in. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love how gorgeous spots like this just pop up around our island, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Thank goodness someone was thoughtful enough to put here! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />With some decent lighting I can finally feel safe walking around here at night. I can't tell you how many times I nearly tripped over a rock while taking my evening stroll.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now who could have put here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When I'm out and about, I often check my appearance in display windows and such. But thisthis is more like it, darling!

<20_2 arg="10" />Oh my,<20_2 arg="9" /> did someone leave their out here, ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Perhaps they're getting ready for a yard sale?You might not know this about me, but I do like secondhand clothes. The vintage look is IN right now!

<20_2 arg="10" />Will you look at that! <20_2 arg="9" />There's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wouldn't say I'm afraid of bugs, but I also wouldn't say I'm NOT afraid of bugs, . So, what I do when I see a bug is I force myself to look them right in the eyes! Of course, sometimes they have so many eyes I don't know which ones to look at!

<20_2 arg="10" />Why, look at that! <20_2 arg="9" />There's !I wonder how this little darling got here? It certainly had some help.Well, you're a lovely surprise to come upon, my fishy fellow. Thank you for brightening my day, .

<20_2 arg="10" />My word, <20_2 arg="9" />I thought I spied something magnificent! And look! It's , no less! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Seeing it this close up, II can't help but get swept up in awe of it allMy pearls! Was my jaw hanging open just then? How uncouth! I hope you you didn't snap any photos of me!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How fabulous is this? Someone has gone and decided to display here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The natural lighting, the fresh air It all elevates this piece's beauty to a whole new level, does it not? I will say, this whole outdoor art thingit's sure to impress discerning art aficionados such as myself.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Out here! Of all places!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Why, I NEVER would have thought such a thing would be appropriate, much less sosopowerful!It just goes to show that a true masterpiece looks fabulous no matter where it's displayed.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I cannot BELIEVE someone would put this precious piece here! ! Here! Oh. Wait a moment. Is this not the actual piece, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I meanI knew that all along, of course. I suppose that, real or not, it does look rather fetching out here.

I hate to sound judgy, darling, but seriously, now<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />someone put outside? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nature does just fine making a breeze all on its own. I'm quite sure it DOESN'T need help, .
<20_2 arg="10" />Oh my!<20_2 arg="9" /> Someone has put here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />How strange to see one on land like this. I wonder how it feels being so far from home, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What? It can't be! My picture, right there in the open, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Then again, why not? If you're going to add a stylish touch to nature like thisYou might as well make me the fashion accessory! I do like to brighten everyone's day.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?That really takes me back. Things like this, toys and such, brought me so much happiness.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sad to think that we forget how to play as we grow older and older, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Well, take a look at this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Don't you think this kind of thing really tickles our fancy? That's what I think, anyway. But outside? That's abold choice. Still, you and I had our little laugh, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmm. Now THIS troubles me. .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I live by the saying "Everything in its place," .And this is simply not the right place. Don't you agree? Maybe it's just me.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do my eyes deceive me? , here?I mean, the outside elements won't be kind. I almost feel sorry for things left outdoors.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know what's waterproofed these days, however. Maybe everything, for all I know.
